welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Longjumeau, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful countryside. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its unique culture and enjoy all that it has to offer. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal Sud
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Ouest
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds and unlimited usage.
